title: Smart Scan - Landing Screen and Initial Scan

body.body: Smart Scan - Landing Screen and Initial Scan
From the diagnostic tool Main Menu, click the
button. The Smart Scan landing page will be displayed.
This screen shows information about the Smart Scan feature along with motorcycle connection instructions.
The Smart Scan feature currently supports:
- All two cylinder and three cylinder models fitted with a KTKS or KTKS-UDS Engine ECM (Euro V compliant Engine ECM with three connectors, introduced from 2019 onwards).
button to view a list of all models supported by the Smart Scan feature.
to begin motorcycle scan and detection.
The diagnostic tool will begin scanning the connected motorcycle.
On some models, you may be required to cycle the motorcycle ignition switch during the scan. The tool will provide pop up instructions where this is required.
When the scan is complete, the tool will progress to motorcycle model and market variant confirmation. See
Smart Scan - Motorcycle Model and Market Variant Confirmation
